text: Stara Sela (; ) is a small village in the Tuhinj Valley in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Selo to Stara sela in 1952.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==See also== *Nova Sela (disambiguation) ==References== ==External links== *Stara Sela at Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Stara Sela
